name: Jumper Kiwi
summary: Join new challenge and even challenge your friends to beat your score. Guaranteed fun, you get to put Kiwi, safe from obstacles. Kiwi is a bird with small wings and can not fly, so you'll have to help him overcome the obstacles to get as far as possible. Will spend vibrant moments with the variety of obstacles to jump, but if you play two hours, you wanting more to go further. Find the different characters and discover that each holds.
